verses.text: I lift up my eyes to the mountains. From where will help for me come?
My help will come from the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*the creator of heaven and earth.
Your foot he will not let stumble: he who guards you will not sleep.
He who watches over Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*himself protects you, is your shelter beside you.
The sun by day will not strike you, nor the moon by night.
From all harm the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*will guard you, will watch over your life.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*will guard your going and coming from now and for evermore.
